T02D2043:142a-1: aagne de wa p'u dza n'a ma /
T02D2043:142a-3: me'i lha mchod pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2043:142a-4: ma lus gdug pa'i sems ldan pa //
T02D2043:142a-5: bla ma la ni sdang ba sogs //
T02D2043:142a-6: gzhom phyir drag byin cho ga ni //
T02D2043:142a-7: gshin rje 'joms mdzad mchod phyir bshad //
T02D2043:142a-8: 'bum ni yongs su rdzogs pa nas //
T02D2043:142a-9: dge ba'i mtshan ma mthong 'gyur ni //
T02D2043:142a-10: lha dang bla ma mthong gyur na //
T02D2043:142a-12: dus dang thab dang rdzas dang ni //
T02D2043:142a-13: cho gas bsgrub par bya ba ste //
T02D2043:142a-14: rnam dag bzhir ni shes par bya //
T02D2043:142a-15: sgrub po bsnyen pa mthar son dus //
T02D2043:142a-16: drag pa'i stobs dang mig mar sogs //
T02D2043:142a-17: drag po'i gza' skar rgyu ba'i dus //
T02D2043:142a-18: mar ngo'i zla ba'i bcu bzhi sogs //
T02D2043:142a-19: drag byed 'byung po rgyu ba'i dus //
T02D2043:142a-20: rgyu ni rlung ni rgyu ba'i dus //
T02D2043:142a-21: dgun smad mtshan phyed dbyar gyi smad //
T02D2043:142a-22: sna bug g-yon nas rlung rgyu'i dus //
T02D2043:142a-23: g-yul 'gyed la sogs skye bo rnams //
T02D2043:142a-24: rab tu 'khrugs pa'i sems ldan dus //
T02D2043:142a-25: 'di ni drag po me yi lha //
T02D2043:142a-26: mchod pa'i rnam dag dus su bshad //
T02D2043:142a-27: de nas gnas kyi mtshan nyid ni //
T02D2043:142a-28: byang du gnas dang mdog nag dang //
T02D2043:142a-29: rtsub shing tsher ma skye ba dang //
T02D2043:142a-30: drag po'i lha tshogs gnas pa'i phyogs //
T02D2043:142a-31: de ni drag byed me yi gnas //
T02D2043:142a-32: thab sogs cho ga bshad par bya //
T02D2043:142a-33: thab lung gru gsum sor nyi shu //
T02D2043:142a-34: zabs su sor bcu ldan pa ste //
T02D2043:142a-35: rdo rje dang ni rtse gsum bri //
T02D2043:142a-36: zla ba rdo rjes mtshan sna tshogs //
T02D2043:142a-37: rdzas kyi rim pa bshad bya ba //
T02D2043:142a-38: rnga mo'i rtug pa rdo thal dang //
T02D2043:142a-39: me tog nag po tsher ma'i shing //
T02D2043:142a-40: sor brgyad khrag sbags tsha ba gsum //
T02D2043:142a-41: dug khrag skye tshe lan tshva dang //
T02D2043:142a-42: dgra yi dri ma la sogs dang //
T02D2043:142a-43: mar ti la 'bras so nas sran gro //
T02D2043:142a-44: d'ur ba ku sha thod par bsre //
T02D2043:142a-45: mdog nag gzugs dang rus sbal gzugs //
T02D2043:142a-46: zhe sdang so 'cha' khro gnyer ldan //
T02D2043:142a-47: gdong nag mig ni bgrad pa'o //
T02D2043:142a-48: dgra bo dgug dang bral zhing dbye //
T02D2043:142a-49: h'um ldan ku shas bsang gtor bri //
T02D2043:142a-51: ku sha bkram la me ni spar //
T02D2043:142a-52: shan pa 'am ro bsregs me yis so //
T02D2043:142a-53: aom aagne dzv'a la dzv'a la ram /
T02D2043:142a-54: me dbus ram las byung ba yi //
T02D2043:142a-55: ra na gzhon pa khros pa'i gzugs //
T02D2043:142b-0: bgrang @142b phreng ril ba dbyug pa can //
T02D2043:142b-1: drang srong nag pos bskor zhing gnag / de nas dgug cing spyan drangs te //
T02D2043:142b-3: aom ae hye hi ma h'a bh'u ta de ba
T02D2043:142b-4: ri shi dvi dza dza:h'um bam ho: aom aagne kro
T02D2043:142b-6: aom badzra ni ri ti kham phat /
T02D2043:142b-10: aom badzra a'a lo ke phat /
T02D2043:142b-11: aom badzra nee bi dhyee phat /
T02D2043:142b-14: dzi aa ku ru ku ru //
T02D2043:142b-21: aom dang sv'a h'as thog mthar brgyan //
T02D2043:142b-23: mchu gnyis ya ra de bzhin du //
T02D2043:142b-24: me lha'i kha la rab bkod la //
T02D2043:142b-25: bus mo'i bar bcug lag pa yi //
T02D2043:142b-26: gsum mam bdun du g-yas nas dbul //
T02D2043:142b-28: sarba p'a pam da ha na /
T02D2043:142b-31: sarba p'a pam bha wa te /
T02D2043:142b-32: aa pra ti ha ta ya //
T02D2043:142b-37: aom dang sv'a h'as thog mthar brgyan //
T02D2043:142b-38: aom aagne de wa ri shi ma h'a te dza gnod byed m'a ra ya phat //
T02D2043:142b-39: de nas snying gar lha yi gzugs //
T02D2043:142b-40: ji bzhin bskyed la de bzhin mchod //
T02D2043:142b-41: aom ya m'anta ka aa mu ka ta m'a ra ya phat /
T02D2043:142b-42: aom dhr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D2043:142b-43: aa mu ka m'a ra ya phat /
T02D2043:142b-45: aa mu ka m'a ra ya phat /
T02D2043:142b-49: pradzny'a dhri ka / mo ha ra ti //
T02D2043:142b-53: mudga dhri ka / danta dhri ka / padma dhri
T02D2043:142b-54: ka / khatga dhri ka / aa mu ka m'a
T02D2043:142b-55: ra ya phat // ces pa ni khyad par ro //
T02D2043:142b-56: de nas mchod cing bstod de bsdu //
T02D2043:142b-57: slar yang lhag mas drang srong mchod //
T02D2043:142b-58: tshangs mgon mchog gi sras po gzi dang ldan //
T02D2043:142b-59: me yi las ster 'jig rten me yi lha //
T02D2043:142b-60: 'bar ba'i nang na sku brjid rgyan gyis ba klubs //
T02D2043:142b-61: phyag 'tshal 'dod don byin la khyed brtson mdzod //
T02D2043:142b-62: bzod par gsol nas gshegs par bya //
T02D2043:142b-63: dngos grub zhu zhing lhag chad bskang //
T02D2043:142b-64: gsad dang rengs pa la sogs pa//
T02D2043:142b-65: ji lta ba yi sbyor bas 'grub //
T02D2043:142b-66: de ltar gshin rje gshed dpal mchod pa yis //
T02D2043:142b-67: srid gsum nyon mongs bud shing kun bsregs nas //
T02D2043:142b-68: 'gro ba'i mun sel ye shes lnga 'od 'bar //
T02D2043:142b-69: rdo rje me yi go 'phang la gnas shog /
T02D2043:142b-70: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sreg byed me'i cho
T02D2043:143a-1: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po darpan a'a ts'arya dang /
